amendment.description: To provide funds to carry out the historic barn preservation program, with an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2128 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2128 proposed by Senator Kohl for Senator Jeffords. (consideration: CR S14142-14143; text: CR S14142-14143) To provide funds to carry out the historic barn preservation program, with an offset.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2128 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
